# test chezmoi cd
chezmoi cd
env CHEZMOI_HOME=$HOME${/}.local${/}share${/}chezmoi
exists $CHEZMOI_HOME
grep -count=1 ${CHEZMOI_HOME@R} shell.log

# test chezmoi cd with command with args
[!exec:bash] stop
env HOME=$WORK${/}home2${/}user
env USERPROFILE=$HOME
chezmoi cd
stdout version

-- home2/user/.config/chezmoi/chezmoi.toml --
[cd]
    command = "bash"
    args = ["--version"]
